name: Mimi the Cat
description:
Mimi the Cat is a platformer made in 12 hours for a college project, where we were tasked with creating a game based on the ideas of elementary school kids. We received a picture of a cat with the words:

"Mimi the Cat. Platformer."

Prototype made in Stencyl

Level Design/Pixel Art/Programming
Andrew Busso

Intro/Outro Art
Hannah Smith

Music

https://www.youtube.com/user/HeatleyBros

SFX
QUICKDRAW, Fantasma Collective (My studio)
